statements: DELETE FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE page_views > 100 AND conversion_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM content_metrics WHERE content_id = 200 AND engagement_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM page_views WHERE page_id = 100 AND view_count < 10;
DELETE FROM content_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 3.5 OR conversion_rate < 2.0;
DELETE FROM EngagementRates WHERE page_id = 1 AND date_recorded = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ConversionRates WHERE page_url = 'example.com/page1' AND date_recorded = '2022-02-15';
DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE user_id = 101 AND conversion_rate > 0.8;
